TopicTitle: Unable to get into saved game.

Articles.Content: I was getting into my saved game in Kerbal Space Program on my ps4 and when I went on, it paused then gave me an error called CE - 34878-0. I have restarted my ps4 and deleted and reinstalled the game but nothing is working. I don't know what the problem is and I am wondering if I can fix it or are all of my creations are gone forever? Help.

@Ducky7480 your best bet is to submit a bug report, http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/

However, due to the lack of interest in the port, your issue may never be resolved.

Best of luck
